register.name: configOption
register.description: Simplified - 0x00, Full - 0xFF - Must be 0x00 in this case

register.name: clkMhz
register.description: Set the working frequency in the unit of MHz

register.name: sdramSizeKb
register.description: Set the memory size of SDRAM CS0 in the unit of kilobytes.Range: 4~4*1024*1024
